botMessages.message: I'm Trippy the Travel-bot and I love helping you get places!
Can I help you with any of the following?
I'm transferring you to a service representative now.
Goodbye! Click the "End Chat" button to end this chat
Thanks for your Loyalty {!tth_FirstName}, did you know you're only {!tth_PointsToNextLevel} points away from unlocking {!tth_NextLevel} benefits?
Sorry, I didn't understand that.
I can help with the following things for your trip to {!objSelectedTrip.tth_Trip_Destination__c}

botDialogs.description: Traveler is on pre trip phase - this dialog sets the context of which trip they wish to talk about
botDialogs.label: Pre Trip Greeting

botMessages.message: How exciting! You're on your way to {!objSelectedTrip.tth_Trip_Destination__c}!
From what I gather on the interwebs, it's all going smoothly right?
Oh good. Can I help you with any of the following?
No current travel plans I see. Can I help you with any of the following?
Oh! I'm sorry to hear you've had a change of plans.
Did you want to cancel the entire trip or just some of it?
Sure, what kind of change were you thinking about?
Sure, I can resend your trip details! How did you want me to get them to you?

botQuickReplyOptions.literalValue: I want to see them right now

botStepConditions.rightOperandValue: I want to see them right now

botMessages.message: I've never personally been to any of these places (I AM a bot after all), I often check out images on the interweb ðŸ˜ƒ.
Do you know when and where you want to go?
I've captured the details of your trip and there's a few options. To continue booking this trip you can:
Sure! You can view all your trip options and recommendations on line here: {!varNewTripURL}
Your current Level is {!tth_TravelerRecord.tth_Loyalty_Status__c} and you have a points balance of {!tth_TravelerRecord.tth_Loyalty_Point_Balance__c}

You have earned a total of {!tth_TravelerRecord.tth_Lifetime_Loyalty_Points__c} points with us and you are {!tth_TravelerRecord.tth_Points_to_Next_Level__c} points away from {!tth_TravelerRecord.tth_Next_Level__c}
Which trip did you want to chat about?
Which booking were you referring to?
Did you want to chat about your upcoming trip to {!tth_NextDestination}?

botDialogs.description: If the Traveler has the Next Trip field populated, confirm that is the trip they want to talk about right now and if not allow them to select a different one
botDialogs.label: Set Trip Context

botMessages.message: {!objSelectedBooking.tth_Bot_Summary__c}
Did you want to look at another one of your booking details?
Sure, I've just emailed you your itinerary for your trip to {!objSelectedTrip.tth_Trip_Destination__c}.
OK, I've cancelled your {!objSelectedBooking.tth_Booking_Type__c} booking.
Ok, I've canceled your entire trip.
Let me as a few questions and then I can help you out. What kind of vibe are you looking for?
What kind of activity interests you?
What kind of landscape are you looking for?
What temperature are you looking for?
Final question, what's your budget?

botDialogs.description: If the traveler does not know when or where they want to travel to, use this dialog to capture their general travel preferences
botDialogs.label: Inspire - New Booking

botMessages.message: When do you want to go? (format is yyyy-mm-dd)
Where do you want to go?
And when do you want to come back? (format is yyyy-mm-dd)
What is the nature of the trip?
How did you want to get there?
Did you need somewhere to stay once you get to {!tripDestination}?

botDialogs.description: If the traveler knows when and where they want to go, capture their travel desires using this.
botDialogs.label: Specific - New Booking

botMessages.message: Are you starting your trip from {!preferredLocation}?
What city are you starting your trip from?

botDialogs.description: Allows the traveler to manually select where they are departing from
botDialogs.label: Ask Departure Location

botMessages.message: The entire trip or just part of it?
New start date?
New end date?
Just checking to see that there's still availability...
OK, I've changed your dates!

botDialogs.description: Changes dates of either the entire trip or just an individual booking
botDialogs.label: Change dates

botMessages.message: What are you looking to add to your trip?

botDialogs.description: Enables travelers to make alterations, purchase extras, etc for their existing trip
botDialogs.label: Add something

botMessages.message: OK, I've included additional baggage for flight(s) {!varUpdatedFlights}. You can simply pay the extra fees when you check-in at the airport.
Sure, what kind of transfer were you looking for?
For both directions?

botQuickReplyOptions.literalValue: No, just on my way out
No, just on my way back

botMessages.message: Which one are you looking for?
OK, I've placed your {!checkInType} request to the following hotel(s): {!updatedHotels}
There's so many options of extra things to do in {!objSelectedTrip.tth_Trip_Destination__c}. I'll connect you with one of our Travel Experience Agents who know all about that area.

botDialogs.label: Book a side tour or extras

botMessages.message: I've added a pre-paid meal voucher to flight(s) {!varUpdatedFlights} and have also made note of your {!travMealPreference} meal preference.

botDialogs.description: For flights, allows traveler to pre-purchase meal vouchers
botDialogs.label: Pre-Purchase a meal

botMessages.message: I'm sorry that things aren't running super smooth for your trip to {!objSelectedTrip.tth_Trip_Destination__c} right now.
We can do a couple of things to try and sort this out:

botDialogs.description: The traveler is on trip and using flight, traffic, weather APIs, we have determined they have experienced some sort of travel disruption
botDialogs.label: Experiencing Trip Disruption

botMessages.message: Oh no! That's not good. Let me check on a few things for you.
With current traffic, your travel time from home to the airport is estimated to be 1 hour and 12 minutes.
Estimated Airport wait time is 32 minutes.
And your flight, {!firstFlightNumber} has been delayed by 15 minutes.
Here's a list of suggested changes for your {!objImpactedBooking.tth_Booking_Type__c} booking on {!objImpactedBooking.tth_Booking_Start_Date__c}
{!objSelectedSuggestion.tth_Change_Summary__c} - {!objSelectedSuggestion.tth_Bot_Summary__c}
Are you ok with these changes?
Did you want to look at the list of suggested changes again?
I've made the changes. Your confirmation code is {!objNewBooking.tth_Booking_Reference__c}.
Here's your impacted bookings, tap on any of them to see my suggested changes.
